aboutUsMessage1: Founded in March of 2020 and based in Kolkata, India. Getto is a trusted online platform for people to list, explore, and buy products.
aboutUsMessage2: Getto Shopping gaurentees product deliveries in just 2-hours through its sonic delivery program. Once an order has been placed from the Getto Shopping application. The seller will receive a notification, that has to be approved, on his/her Getto Business application. A delivery executive is then assigned to pick up the product from the store and deliver it to the customer within 2 hours.
